    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Constructor for a deck of cards. Creates an arraylist containing the playingcards. Ace - King 0 - 12 = hearts. 13 - 25 = spades. 26 - 38 = clubs. 39 - 51 = diamonds.

    • Method Detail

      • getCard

        public Card getCard(int i)
        A get method to get a card from the deck.
        Parameters:
        i - is the position of the card
        Returns:
        The card at that position.

      • shuffleDeck

        public void shuffleDeck()
        Shuffles the deck using a Random.

      • getDeck

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
        Returns:
        the deck

      • returnCard

        public void returnCard(Card card)
        takes a card and puts it back in the deck. Also sets i to notSelected.
        Parameters:
        card - the card to put back in the deck
